original: 曹操寨中，聽得擂鼓吶喊，如臨大敵。然曹操斷定重霧迷江，必有埋伏，僅命人帶領弓弩手，前往江邊助射。
text: In the village of Cao Cao, you can hear the drums and shouts, like a big enemy. However, Cao Cao determined that there must be an ambush in the heavy fog and lost the river, so he ordered the crossbowmen to lead the crossbowmen to the river to assist in the shooting.
